name: Ethanol, 85%, blended, at service station, 2022
description:
The production of ethanol utilized in this process assigns inputs to co-products (e.g., wheat kernals and straw, corn grain and stover) based on activities and inputs that are required for the growth and harvest and preprocessing of, e.g., wheat straw, and none that of the activities or inputs that would normally be used to produce, harvest and preprocess, e.g., wheat kernals (so-called "incremental allocation"). 
NEED TO ADD CONCRETE AND REBAR FOR NEW E85 REFUELING ISLANDS, AND AMORTIZE.

processDocumentation.restrictionsDescription: All information can be accessed by everybody.

exchanges.description: despite it's name, "E85, at blending terminal" actually does include the final transport of blended E85 to the refueling station, so no transportation needs to be included in this process.
Total number of new retail tanks to support EISA volumes divided by lifetime gallons (50 years); then divided by density of E85 in kg/gallon to get price per kg.  Units: piece/kg Ethanol

flow.name: CUTOFF Liquid storage tank, chemicals, organics

exchanges.description: I believe the the ecoinvent process of "petrol, at regional storage" includes dispensing. (CONFIRM) This petrol was mixed with ethanol in the "E85, 2022, at blending terminal", and thus we shouldn't double count the (small) energy use for dispensing the petrol portion of E85. Assumes low voltage electricity for this process. Low voltage is <1 kV (Swiss estimate; personal communication with Christian Bauer, modeler of this process)

Price (2008 USD) of E85 Curb and whip hoses needed during the EISA timeframe (2008-2022) per gallons of E85 dispensed during EISA; then divided by density of E85 in kg/gallon to get price per kg.  (Actually this accounts for ethanol sold in 2023 because of the two year lifetime of hoses means the effective lifetime of nozzles installed during EISA extends plus 1 year). Units: USD/kg Ethanol.

flow.name: CUTOFF Rubber and plastics hose and belting

exchanges.description: Price (2008 USD) of E85 dispenser per lifetime (15 years) gallons of E85 dispensed from 2008 through 2022 PLUS Price (2008 USD) of E85 Nozzle, Swivel and Safety breaks needed during the EISA timeframe (2008-2022) per gallons of E85 dispensed during EISA; then divided by density of E85 in kg/gallon to get price per kg.  (Actually this accounts for ethanol sold in 2023 because the two year lifetime of nozzles, etc. means the effective lifetime of nozzles installed during EISA extends plus 1 year). Units: USD/kg Ethanol.
